languages.text: When dodging an attack, the wearer immediately counterattacks, even being able to shoot in melee. This counterattack deals {uip|Damage|587c463377a14c9f843841fd7a19f461}% (max 100) damage

traits.locale_text: When dodging an attack, the wearer immediately counterattacks, even being able to shoot in melee. This counterattack deals {uip|Damage|587c463377a14c9f843841fd7a19f461}% (max 100) damage

languages.text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an attack, they immediately counter-attack (Can even counter-attack with a ranged weapon in melee range). That counter-attack deals {uip|Damage|587c463377a14c9f843841fd7a19f461}% of weapon damage (cannot be more than 100%).
languages.original_text: When dodging an attack, the wearer immediately counterattacks, even being able to shoot in melee. This counterattack deals {uip|Damage|587c463377a14c9f843841fd7a19f461}% (max 100) damage

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g}an attack, they immediately counter-attack (if attacked in melee range, can even counter-attack with a ranged weapon). That counter-attack deals {uip|Damage|587c463377a14c9f843841fd7a19f461}% of the weapon damage (cannot be more than 100%).

Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g}an attack, they immediately counter-attack (Can even counter-attack with a ranged weapon in melee range). That counter-attack deals {uip|Damage|587c463377a14c9f843841fd7a19f461}% of weapon damage (cannot be more than 100%).

Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g}an attack, they immediately counter-attack (Can even counter-attack with a ranged weapon in melee range). That counter-attack deals {uip|Damage|587c463377a14c9f843841fd7a19f461}% of weapon damage (cannot be more than 100%).

languages.text:
使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}に成功するたびに、即座に反撃を行う（近接攻撃を受けた場合は、遠隔武器でも反撃可能）。
その反撃は武器ダメージの{uip|Damage|587c463377a14c9f843841fd7a19f461}%を与える（100%を超えることはない）。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g}an attack, they immediately counter-attack (if attacked in melee range, can even counter-attack with a ranged weapon). That counter-attack deals {uip|Damage|587c463377a14c9f843841fd7a19f461}% of the weapon damage (cannot be more than 100%).

traits.locale_text:
使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}に成功するたびに、即座に反撃を行う（近接攻撃を受けた場合は、遠隔武器でも反撃可能）。
その反撃は武器ダメージの{uip|Damage|587c463377a14c9f843841fd7a19f461}%を与える（100%を超えることはない）。

languages.text: Когда персонаж {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняется{/g} от атаки, он немедленно совершает контратаку, которая наносит {uip|Damage|587c463377a14c9f843841fd7a19f461}% урона от оружия (но не выше 100%). Персонаж может контратаковать в ближнем бою даже дистанционным оружием.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an attack, they immediately counter-attack (Can even counter-attack with a ranged weapon in melee range). That counter-attack deals {uip|Damage|587c463377a14c9f843841fd7a19f461}% of weapon damage (cannot be more than 100%).

traits.locale_text: Когда персонаж {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняется{/g} от атаки, он немедленно совершает контратаку, которая наносит {uip|Damage|587c463377a14c9f843841fd7a19f461}% урона от оружия (но не выше 100%). Персонаж может контратаковать в ближнем бою даже дистанционным оружием.

Когда персонах {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняется{/g} от атаки, он немедленно совершает контратаку. Персонаж может контратаковать в ближнем бою даже дистанционным оружием. Контратака наносит {uip|Damage|587c463377a14c9f843841fd7a19f461}% урона от оружия (но выше 100%).

Когда персонаж {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняется{/g} от атаки, он немедленно совершает контратаку, которая наносит {uip|Damage|587c463377a14c9f843841fd7a19f461}% урона от оружия (но не выше 100%). Персонаж может контратаковать в ближнем бою даже дистанционным оружием.

languages.text: Wenn der Träger einen Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweicht{/g}, geht er sofort zum Gegenangriff über. Dieser Gegenangriff ist auch in Nahkampfreichweite mit einer Fernkampfwaffe möglich. Der Gegenangriff verursacht {uip|Damage|587c463377a14c9f843841fd7a19f461} % Waffenschaden (max. 100 %).
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an attack, they immediately counter-attack (Can even counter-attack with a ranged weapon in melee range). That counter-attack deals {uip|Damage|587c463377a14c9f843841fd7a19f461}% of weapon damage (cannot be more than 100%).

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Träger einen Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweicht{/g}, geht er sofort zum Gegenangriff über. Dieser Gegenangriff ist auch in Nahkampfreichweite mit einer Fernkampfwaffe möglich. Der Gegenangriff verursacht {uip|Damage|587c463377a14c9f843841fd7a19f461} % Waffenschaden (max. 100 %).

languages.text: Giyen kişi, bir saldırıdan her {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçındığında{/g} anında karşı saldırı gerçekleştirir (menzilli silahla yakın dövüş menzilinde bile karşı saldırı yapabilir). Bu karşı saldırı, silah hasarının %{uip|Damage|587c463377a14c9f843841fd7a19f461} kadarını verir (%100'den fazla olamaz).
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an attack, they immediately counter-attack (Can even counter-attack with a ranged weapon in melee range). That counter-attack deals {uip|Damage|587c463377a14c9f843841fd7a19f461}% of weapon damage (cannot be more than 100%).

traits.locale_text: Giyen kişi, bir saldırıdan her {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçındığında{/g} anında karşı saldırı gerçekleştirir (menzilli silahla yakın dövüş menzilinde bile karşı saldırı yapabilir). Bu karşı saldırı, silah hasarının %{uip|Damage|587c463377a14c9f843841fd7a19f461} kadarını verir (%100'den fazla olamaz).

languages.text: Chaque fois que le porteur {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} une attaque, il effectue immédiatement une contre-attaque (il peut utiliser des armes à distance en mêlée). La contre-attaque inflige {uip|Damage|587c463377a14c9f843841fd7a19f461} % des dégâts de l'arme (limitée à 100 % des dégâts de l'arme).
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an attack, they immediately counter-attack (Can even counter-attack with a ranged weapon in melee range). That counter-attack deals {uip|Damage|587c463377a14c9f843841fd7a19f461}% of weapon damage (cannot be more than 100%).

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que le porteur {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} une attaque, il effectue immédiatement une contre-attaque (il peut utiliser des armes à distance en mêlée). La contre-attaque inflige {uip|Damage|587c463377a14c9f843841fd7a19f461} % des dégâts de l'arme (limitée à 100 % des dégâts de l'arme).

languages.text: Cada vez que el portador {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} un ataque, contraataca inmediatamente (incluso puede contraatacar con un arma a distancia en cuerpo a cuerpo). Ese contraataque inflige un {uip|Damage|587c463377a14c9f843841fd7a19f461} % del daño del arma (sin exceder el 100 %).
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an attack, they immediately counter-attack (Can even counter-attack with a ranged weapon in melee range). That counter-attack deals {uip|Damage|587c463377a14c9f843841fd7a19f461}% of weapon damage (cannot be more than 100%).

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el portador {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} un ataque, contraataca inmediatamente (incluso puede contraatacar con un arma a distancia en cuerpo a cuerpo). Ese contraataque inflige un {uip|Damage|587c463377a14c9f843841fd7a19f461} % del daño del arma (sin exceder el 100 %).

languages.text: 每当装备者{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}攻击时，都会立刻进行反击（甚至可以使用远程武器反击近战范围内的敌人）。此次反击造成{uip|Damage|587c463377a14c9f843841fd7a19f461}%（最多100%）的武器伤害。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an attack, they immediately counter-attack (Can even counter-attack with a ranged weapon in melee range). That counter-attack deals {uip|Damage|587c463377a14c9f843841fd7a19f461}% of weapon damage (cannot be more than 100%).

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}攻击时，都会立刻进行反击（甚至可以使用远程武器反击近战范围内的敌人）。此次反击造成{uip|Damage|587c463377a14c9f843841fd7a19f461}%（最多100%）的武器伤害。
